data.actual_result: you get the ""please turn on Bluetooth and WiFi to activate Nearby"  and it doesn't go away if you hit cancel and try aging either
data.expected_result: It starts the find friends searching
data.short_description: If you have Bluetooth off on nearby friends and turn it on through the prompt message, you are still hit with the "please turn on Bluetooth and WiFi to activate Nearby"
data.steps_to_repro: - make sure Bluetooth is turned off in ios settings  - start discord up  - go up to the top and click on the three heads - click on friends and go all the way to the top right - click on the head with a +  - click on find friends  - get a prompt asking you to turn Bluetooth on  - select settings, turn on Bluetooth and then go back  - click on find friends and observe
